data.title: Henry Cavill Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Henry Cavill on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Henry Cavill including Argylle, The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare, and â¦
data.text:
The Green Man

Barnaby and Troy tackle two separate cases as Troy prepares to leave Midsomer after his promotion to DI.

Well Schooled in Murder

When an old school friend contacts Lynley about a missing schoolboy, the inspector soon finds himself launching a murder inquiry.

Episode 1

Graham is joined on his heroic sofa by Oscar winner Ben Affleck, his adversary Superman, British star Henry Cavill, and five-times-Oscar-nominated Amy Adams, who plays Superman's squeeze Lois Lane.
